button.title: Button
button.description: Versatile button component with multiple variants including muted and semantic color variants, built on Base UI.

text-input.title: Text Input
text-input.description: Single-line text input field with label, error, helper text, and icon slot support.

text-area.title: Text Area
text-area.description: Multi-line text input field with customizable rows and resize support.

checkbox.title: Checkbox
checkbox.description: Checkbox with inline and card variants, lucide icons, and controlled/uncontrolled state support.

radio.title: Radio
radio.description: Radio button with inline and card variants, lucide icons, and controlled/uncontrolled state support.

radio-group.title: Radio Group
radio-group.description: Radio button group with horizontal/vertical orientation and variant propagation to children.

select.title: Select
select.description: Dropdown select component with custom styling and description support, built on Base UI.

switch.title: Switch
switch.description: Toggle switch component with label support and smooth transitions.

number-input.title: Number Input
number-input.description: Numeric input with increment/decrement buttons, built on Base UI NumberField.

slider.title: Slider
slider.description: Range slider component with value display and improved thumb/track styling.

color-picker.title: Color Picker
color-picker.description: Color picker using native HTML5 color input with hex text input.

date-picker.title: Date Picker
date-picker.description: Single date selection with custom calendar grid using Base UI Popover and @rehookify/datepicker.

date-range-picker.title: Date Range Picker
date-range-picker.description: Date range selection with start/end date display and custom calendar.

file-upload.title: File Upload
file-upload.description: File input with drag-and-drop support and file list display.

rich-text-input.title: Rich Text Input
rich-text-input.description: Tiptap-based rich text editor with integrated formatting toolbar.

dialog.title: Dialog
dialog.description: Slide-in panel dialog (right on desktop, bottom on mobile) with optional centered modal mode.

alert-dialog.title: Alert Dialog
alert-dialog.description: Confirmation dialog with cancel and confirm actions.

alert.title: Alert
alert.description: Inline alert component with variants for info, success, warning, and error using muted background tokens.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Hover tooltip component with customizable positioning and dark background.

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: Status badge component with solid and muted color variants.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: User avatar component with image, initials fallback, and size variants.

card.title: Card
card.description: Container card component with header, content, and footer sections.

accordion.title: Accordion
accordion.description: Collapsible accordion component built on Base UI.

tabs.title: Tabs
tabs.description: Tabbed navigation component with panel content and underline indicator.

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Progress bar component with label and value display.

skeleton.title: Skeleton
skeleton.description: Loading skeleton component with text, circular, and rectangular variants.

pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.description: Page navigation component with customizable sibling count.

dropdown-menu.title: Dropdown Menu
dropdown-menu.description: Dropdown menu component built on Base UI Menu.

popover.title: Popover
popover.description: Popover overlay component with customizable positioning.

portal.title: Portal
portal.description: Portal wrapper component for rendering content outside the DOM hierarchy.

file-icon.title: File Icon
file-icon.description: Icon component that renders the appropriate Lucide icon based on file name extension or MIME type.

image-preview-dialog.title: Image Preview Dialog
image-preview-dialog.description: Inline image with click-to-expand fullscreen viewer dialog. Supports controlled and uncontrolled open state, hover button, and optional metadata display.

file-details-dialog.title: File Details Dialog
file-details-dialog.description: Dialog showing file metadata (name, size, type, uploader, date) with processing status and optional content slot.

file-upload-input.title: File Upload Input
file-upload-input.description: Advanced file upload with drag-and-drop, image grid previews, existing items management, and image expand dialog.

sidebar.title: Sidebar
sidebar.description: Vertical navigation sidebar with logo slot, prop-driven nav items, and user account popover.

header.title: Header
header.description: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll effect, mobile hamburger menu, and user account popover.
